title: Songwriting Camp Questions!
paragraph: Welcome to songwriting camp. There are a few things we'd like to know before you join us. If you have made a reservation for more than one person, please add information for each person below!!!!!
camping-label: Attending as a guest (pays room and board only)
notes-label: Other Notes TO GET EXCITED ABOUT!!
lodging-label: Lodging Preference for you or your group:
